content:
Remove most logging on the server. I do want to keep these messages:
API Type: OpenAI
Total tokens: 5763
Total response size: 1074957 bytes
Duration: 68.60 seconds
Tokens per second: 84.01

And the messages like:
 POST /api/restore-file 200 in 11ms
remove logging from chat-with-images except the messages above that I want to keep
Comment out the part that writes the file api_request_log_... I want to keep the functionality but not write to it for now.
